text:
Best regards,

{processorName}

SAP Product Support APJ

-----------------------

SAP Support Contact details: see note 560499

Definition of Cases' Priority: see note 67739

KBA 1239839 - How to close a support incident - SAP ONE Support Launchpad

KBA 2331471 - 2331471 - How to provide Feedback on Incident handling via SAP Support Interaction Survey - SAP ONE Launchpad [VIDEO]

Dear {Customer},

  • Thanks for contacting us.

  • Thank you for reaching out to us.

  • We are currently investigating your reported issue and will provide updates on progress or resolution at regular intervals. Should you have any additional comments or information regarding this issues please update the ticket accordingly.

  • I'm taking this Case under investigation and will update you once there is any progress.

  • I can reproduce it in my OOTB environment …

  • We inspected the {log|configuration|dump|…} files attached and we can see {error|exception|…}

  • As per your request, we have {operation}

  • Can you please share with us the following {files|configuration|code snippet|setting | … } from {path | node | className | backoffice |…}

  • {Rephrase the description from wiki/Jira/KBA}

    • list key points

      • point1, point2, point3 …

  • As this ticket is for the {XXXX} issue, according to SAP one issue one Case policy, we recommend to raise another new ticket to us for issue tracking.

    • Our product support will help you investigate and fix in that new one.

    • Thank you for your understanding

 

{signature}

Dear {Customer},

 

{Description of the issue or a brief recap of the issue.}

What we are Doing:

{Body of message describing what we are doing to resolve the issue}

What to Expect:

{Body of message describing what to expect from us}

Next Steps:

{Body of message describing what we will do next}

 

{signature}

{Description of the issue or a brief recap of the issue.}

  • Action Plan for Customer

  1. Provide step by step process to reproduce the reported issue.

  2. Provide context details about what was changed or applied in the system before this issue occurred.

  3. Provide necessary information (code snippet, configuration, log, dump file, ).

  4. Implement recommendations to resolve issue (patch, script, hotfix…).

  • Action Plan for SAP

  1. Review customer's environment and collect necessary information, better to make a list of the information we've collected.

  2. Perform Root Cause Analysis based on existing information to identify the issue

  3. Existing issue identified:

    1. Recommended patch / action / workaround.

  4. New issue identified:

    1. Perform analysis to identify any potential fix.

    2. Report to DEV/Security team.

 

{signature}

Dear {Customer},

 

 {opening sentences}

  • Thank you for your patience.

  • Your {request | issue} is in progress and is being investigated.

  • …

 {if find some clues | workarounds | existing wiki/KBAs | suggestions}

  • We inspected the {log|configuration|dump|…} files attached and we can see {error|exception|…}

  • {Rephrase the description from wiki/ Jira / KBA}

    • list key points

      • point1, point2, point3 …

  • Can you please share with us the following {files|configuration|code snippet|setting | … } from {path | node | className | backoffice |…}

 {if complex situation | difficult issue | time consuming}

 

{signature}

Dear {Customer},

Please be informed that you will receive an update about this Case before {timezone : date : time}. In case you need us to engage before that time, please contact our Customer Interaction Center(Check SAP Note 560499).

{signature}

Dear {Customer},

 

 Option 1 – relevant new information

{Describe the new information using customer’s language (i.e. avoid technical terms)} 

 Option 2 – no relevant new information (standard update times)

We are still processing your Case. Unfortunately, there is currently no new information
that we can provide.

Please specify when the customer might receive an update (Date / Time)
according to the mandatory Ongoing Response Times (ORT).

{text}

 Option 3 – no relevant new information (individual update times depending on situation)

We are still processing your Case. Unfortunately, there is currently no new information that we can provide.

We will contact you again in {insert a realistic expected time until the next contextual update} at the latest.

Manually override the ORT in Service Now with this new value (date/time).

We really appreciate your patience. 

 

{signature}

Dear Customer,

 

  • Thank you for your feedback! I'm glad to hear your issue was fixed. We kindly ask you to confirm this Case

  • Thank you for working with us. We kindly ask you to confirm this Case. Please let us know if you have any other concern with this specific case.

 

Here's a reminder of what your ticket was about:

{Issue details & our solution}

 

We'd love to hear what you think of our support service. Please take a moment to fill the Support Interaction Survey form which is a quick 5 question survey to help us improve our service (popup message about SIS form might be blocked by the browser).

Direct link to SIS survey: https://launchpad.support.sap.com/#/pcc/pointer/{Case_ID}/app/CI/langu/E

Below notes are for your reference:

KBA 1239839 - How to close an Case on the SAP ONE Support Launchpad (Support Portal) https://launchpad.support.sap.com/#/notes/1239839

KBA 2331471 - How do customers answer the SAP Support Interaction

Survey in SAP One Support Launchpad https://launchpad.support.sap.com/#/notes/2331471

Dear Customer,

 

I have taken your incident under investigation. We will get back to you with our findings after initial analysis with updates or questions to you on this issue.

If you have any additional questions or thoughts, please feel free to update the ticket anytime.

 

Kind regards,

[name surname]

[team name & region]

CX Cloud Services & Operations

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
KBA 1239839 - How to close an incident on the SAP One Support Launchpad
KBA 2331471 - How do customers answer the feedback survey in SAP One Support Launchpad
For quick help, how-tos, please visit our SAP Community sites: Cloud Support & On-Premise Support

Dear Customer,

 

For us to further investigate your issue, please provide a screenshot or sample of errors you are receiving.

Also, it will be helpful if you can provide step-by-step instructions on how to reproduce your problem.

 

Kind regards,

[name surname]

[team name & region]

CX Cloud Services & Operations

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
KBA 1239839 - How to close an incident on the SAP One Support Launchpad
KBA 2331471 - How do customers answer the feedback survey in SAP One Support Launchpad
For quick help, how-tos, please visit our SAP Community sites: Cloud Support & On-Premise Support

Dear Customer,

 

I would like to suggest you a screensharing session via TEAMS.

If you agree to have one please suggest when can we arrange a meeting.

I am available from Monday to Friday between 10:00 - 15:00 CET.

 

Kind regards,

[name surname]

[team name & region]

CX Cloud Services & Operations

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
KBA 1239839 - How to close an incident on the SAP One Support Launchpad
KBA 2331471 - How do customers answer the feedback survey in SAP One Support Launchpad
For quick help, how-tos, please visit our SAP Community sites: Cloud Support & On-Premise Support

Dear Customer,

 

We have changed the priority you suggested because from our perspective the preconditions for this particular priority are not met in this case.

However, we will process your case as quickly as possible.

 

If you do not agree with the priority reduction please update the ticket and contact Customer Interaction Center (CIC).

Thank you for your understanding.

 

Kind regards,

[name surname]

[team name & region]

CX Cloud Services & Operations

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
KBA 1239839 - How to close an incident on the SAP One Support Launchpad
KBA 2331471 - How do customers answer the feedback survey in SAP One Support Launchpad
For quick help, how-tos, please visit our SAP Community sites: Cloud Support & On-Premise Support

Dear Customer,

 

Apologies for not reaching out to you earlier but our support engineers were impacted by the heavy workload in the last couple of weeks.

We would kindly like to ask you if this issue is still valid or was it already resolved on your side?

We will be looking forward for your response.

 

Kind regards,

[name surname]

[team name & region]

CX Cloud Services & Operations

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
KBA 1239839 - How to close an incident on the SAP One Support Launchpad
KBA 2331471 - How do customers answer the feedback survey in SAP One Support Launchpad
For quick help, how-tos, please visit our SAP Community sites: Cloud Support & On-Premise Support

Dear Customer,

 

We would like to inform you that we have triggered the involvement of the <enter name> Team for the resolution of the issue. As soon as we have new information regarding the progress of the analysis, we will contact you.

We would like to thank you for your cooperation and patience.

 

Kind regards,

[name surname]

[team name & region]

CX Cloud Services & Operations

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
KBA 1239839 - How to close an incident on the SAP One Support Launchpad
KBA 2331471 - How do customers answer the feedback survey in SAP One Support Launchpad
For quick help, how-tos, please visit our SAP Community sites: Cloud Support & On-Premise Support

Dear Customer,

 

We are sorry but the analysis of the issue has not produced sufficient evidence to suggest that the behavior you are describing is due to malfunction in the eCommerce product.

The next steps would be configuration and code review of your solution which is outside the scope of Product Support Team. We therefore believe that the involvement of Expert Services is advisable.

If you would like us to get you in contact with your Service Delivery manager in order to arrange for an engagement, please let us know.

 

Kind regards,

[name surname]

[team name & region]

CX Cloud Services & Operations

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
KBA 1239839 - How to close an incident on the SAP One Support Launchpad
KBA 2331471 - How do customers answer the feedback survey in SAP One Support Launchpad
For quick help, how-tos, please visit our SAP Community sites: Cloud Support & On-Premise Support

REASON FOR HANDOVER & QUICK NEXT STEPS FOR THE TAKEOVER ENGINEER

* End of shift

ISSUE IN ENVIRONMENT

*

PROBLEM DESCRIPTION

*

SUMMARY OF ACTION TAKEN SO FAR

*

NEXT STEPS

*

Dear Customer,

 

We would like to inform you, that we're still processing your incident.

Unfortunately, there is currently no new information that we can provide. We assure you, that we're working on a sufficient solution for you, and will reach out to you as soon, as we have any updates or questions on this issue.

We really appreciate your patience.

 

Kind regards,

[name surname]

[team name & region]

CX Cloud Services & Operations

KBA 2331471 - How do customers answer the feedback survey in SAP One Support Launchpad
For quick help, how-tos, please visit our SAP Community sites: Cloud Support & On-Premise Support

Dear Customer,

 

We have identified the root cause of the issue and the teams are working on resolving this issue.

Currently it's hard to estimate when the issue will be fixed. You will be able to run a new deployment when the Cloud Portal will be back.

 

Kind regards,

[name surname]

[team name & region]

metadata.title: Customer reports, that provided solution works

text:
Dear Customer,

 

We're happy to hear, that the provided solution works now.

If you don't have any further questions, it would be very helpful if you could confirm this ticket and it would be pleasant If you would fill the customer survey afterwards (for more information on how to close a ticket and fill the survey, please see the articles attached in footer). We eager to improve our service, and it takes only 1 minute of your time to share your experience with Product Support on this ticket.

Thank you in advance for filling the customer survey.

 

Kind regards,

[name surname]

[team name & region]

CX Cloud Services & Operations

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
KBA 1239839 - How to close an incident on the SAP One Support Launchpad
KBA 2331471 - How do customers answer the feedback survey in SAP One Support Launchpad
For quick help, how-tos, please visit our SAP Community sites: Cloud Support & On-Premise Support

Dear Customer,

 

To proceed with the investigation, we need you to provide us with the backoffice credentials (login/password).

The default credentials, we have access to now aren't working.

 

Kind regards,

[name surname]

[team name & region]

CX Cloud Services & Operations

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
KBA 1239839 - How to close an incident on the SAP One Support Launchpad
KBA 2331471 - How do customers answer the feedback survey in SAP One Support Launchpad
For quick help, how-tos, please visit our SAP Community sites: Cloud Support & On-Premise Support

Dear Customer,

We are working on your request. Please stand by for further updates.

As the request is for a root cause analysis (RCA), we are reducing the priority to HIGH and will provide you RCA as soon as we get the updates.

If you have any updates or concerns on this issue, please let us know.

Kind regards,

[name surname]

[team name & region]

CX Cloud Services & Operations

KBA 1239839 - How to close an incident on the SAP One Support Launchpad
KBA 2331471 - How do customers answer the feedback survey in SAP One Support Launchpad
For quick help, how-tos, please visit our SAP Community sites: Cloud Support & On-Premise Support

Dear Customer,

 

This is a different issue than the one originally reported in the ticket.

Due to SAP's policy, we're investigating one issue per case for better management and tracking reasons.

Please create a new ticket for this new issue.

 

Kind regards,

[name surname]

[team name & region]

CX Cloud Services & Operations

KBA 2331471 - How do customers answer the feedback survey in SAP One Support Launchpad
For quick help, how-tos, please visit our SAP Community sites: Cloud Support & On-Premise Support

Dear Customer,

 

I've created a maintenance ticket to our Development Team- you can follow it here: [ECP LINK]

Please note that this ticket has to be validated by our admins first, so you may not be able to view it right away but in couple of days.

As we are waiting for the development team's action and Product Support cannot do anything at this moment, It would be very helpful if you would change the status of this incident to "confirmed" so there will be no duplicate info regarding this issue as you can watch the progress on the above ECP ticket.

 

Kind regards,

[name surname]

[team name & region]

CX Cloud Services & Operations

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

KBA 2331471 - How do customers answer the feedback survey in SAP One Support Launchpad
For quick help, how-tos, please visit our SAP Community sites: Cloud Support & On-Premise Support

Dear Customer,

 

We are waiting for the development team to take action on this case.

There is nothing, that Product Support could investigate further at this moment.

We're kindly asking for your patience on this case.

 

Kind regards,

[name surname]

[team name & region]

CX Cloud Services & Operations

KBA 1239839 - How to close an incident on the SAP One Support Launchpad
KBA 2331471 - How do customers answer the feedback survey in SAP One Support Launchpad
For quick help, how-tos, please visit our SAP Community sites: Cloud Support & On-Premise Support

Dear Customer,

 

It is not in Product Support's scope to watch the progress of an deployment on our customer's enviornments.

In case there are any issues regarding your deployment, please come back on this ticket, and raise the priority to Very High, so it will be noticed earlier by our engineers.

 

Kind regards,

[name surname]

[team name & region]

CX Cloud Services & Operations

Dear Customer,

Thanks for reaching out to SAP CX Commerce Product Support.

Please note Spartacus product is supported via dedicated Slack channel instead of Support tickets.

Please refer to Spartacus support process via  KBA 2708660

Spartacus Slack Workspace Link:

https://join.slack.com/t/spartacus-storefront/shared_invite/enQtNDM1OTI3OTMwNjU5LTg1NGVjZmFkZjQzODc1MzFhMjc3OTZmMzIzYzg0YjMwODJiY2YxYjA5MTE5NjVmN2E5NjMxNjEzMGNlMDRjMjU
